title: How to Make Baileys Irish Cream Truffles

text: Making the Truffle Mixture Place a pot on very low heat. Add the heavy cream, chocolate, and Baileys. Allow to cook gently to melt together. You might prefer to use a double boiler for this part. Remove the pan from the heat. Whisk in the butter and eggs very quickly. You'll want the eggs to mix in, not cook. Place the mixture in the refrigerator. Allow to chill until the chocolate is firm (for example, overnight). Creating the Truffle Balls Spoon up the mixture in a teaspoon. Create small balls using your clean fingers. Add edible decoration. Dip or roll the truffle balls into cocoa, powdered sugar, sprinkles, etc. Done. If giving as a gift, place the truffles into individual paper cases and arrange neatly in a gift box with a lid. Seal with a ribbon and add a card.
